page.title: 18A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: _ My Typical Day (by S.Cullen 2Y) Monday to Friday I wake early in the morning,my rising I try to adjourn.Then my dad bellows up the stairway,his voice sounding harsh and stern. I search for my way to the bathroom,my legs feeling like a ton of lead,I turn on full the cold tap,and under it stick aching head. I trip my way down the stairway,my eyes yet to focus properly.I find on the tray in the kitchen,a stone cold cup of tea. I leave home then within a minute, riding slow upon my bike, hoping in my numb mind, that the scholl is closed my a teachers strike. The strike,it happens anually,they say they do it for more pay.But I reckon they do it to go on their annual holiday. {
